overview: The film was made by scratching stenciled text into the surface of the film material. The text is a synced replication of the lyrics from The Fall song Art Prole Threat. Each word is reproduced on one frame only, appearing in the exact time/ space of the original recording (from The Fall’s 1981 EP ‘Slates’). The original track is intended to be played (loud) in the darkened cinema before the film is played (mute) on the screen directly afterwards.
title: Prole Art Threat
